com.logicmonitor.spm.service

Interface CompanyService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyServiceImpl

    public interface CompanyService
    Service that provides the ability to add, delete and view company information
    Author:
    Supraj

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCompany(java.lang.String companySymbol)
      Validates if a company symbol is correct, retrieves the name of the company from the Stock information service and then adds company information to the database
      void deleteCompany(java.lang.String companySymbol)
      Deletes the company from the database and thus the company won't be monitored anymore
      java.util.List<CompanyDTO> getCompanies()
      Lists the names of all companies that are monitored
      CompanyDTO getCompanyInfo(java.lang.String companySymbol)
      Returns the a particular company information

    • Method Detail

      • addCompany

        void addCompany(java.lang.String companySymbol)
         throws InvalidSymbolException,
                StorageException,
                InvalidJsonException
        Validates if a company symbol is correct, retrieves the name of the company from the Stock information service and then adds company information to the database
        Parameters:
        companySymbol - - The stock symbol of the company. Example - Microsoft - MSFT
        Throws:
        InvalidSymbolException - - If the company symbol that the user is trying to add is invalid
        StorageException - - If there was an exception while persisting the data
        InvalidJsonException - - If there was an exception while trying to read the JSON provided by the Stock information provider

      • deleteCompany

        void deleteCompany(java.lang.String companySymbol)
            throws StorageException
        Deletes the company from the database and thus the company won't be monitored anymore
        Parameters:
        companySymbol - - The stock symbol of the company. Example - Microsoft - MSFT
        Throws:
        StorageException - - If there was an exception while deleting the company from the database

      • getCompanies

        java.util.List<CompanyDTO> getCompanies()
                                 throws StorageException
        Lists the names of all companies that are monitored
        Returns:
        - An array of CompanyDTO objects which contain the company name, symbol and creation date
        Throws:
        StorageException - If there was an exception while retrieving the data

      • getCompanyInfo

        CompanyDTO getCompanyInfo(java.lang.String companySymbol)
                   throws StorageException
        Returns the a particular company information
        Parameters:
        companySymbol - - The stock symbol of the company. Example - Microsoft - MSFT
        Returns:
        - A CompanyDTO object with its name, symbol and creation time
        Throws:
        StorageException - If there was an exception while retrieving the data
